snippet: Bridgewater Associates wants to ensure that its new office in Stamford, Conn., is accessible by various forms of transportation. In addition to a new headquarters building, the hedge fund is planning “a helipad, a floating recreational barge, a...
abstract: Bridgewater Associates wants to ensure that its new office in Stamford, Conn., is accessible by various forms of transportation. In addition to a new headquarters building, the hedge fund is planning “a helipad, a floating recreational barge, a restored estuary and a marina,” The Stamford Advocate reports. .
lead_paragraph: Bridgewater Associates wants to ensure that its new office in Stamford, Conn., is accessible by various forms of transportation. In addition to a new headquarters building, the hedge fund is planning “a helipad, a floating recreational barge, a restored estuary and a marina,” The Stamford Advocate reports. Read more »
